nodes.text: Attack Droid AD-43 was a Viper probe droid employed by Jerec on Ruusan in 5 ABY.

It was programmed to gather intelligence and kill those attempting to reach the Valley of the Jedi. Grif Grawley successfully disabled AD-43, but was killed when the droid crashed into a cliff. Before the droid's termination, it transmitted scan of three Humans and one bouncer to the Imperial forces: Grif Grawley, Kyle Katarn, Jan Ors, and Floater.
